outcome_goals.description: Reduce incidences of abuse and neglect; Decrease entries into foster care; Reduce disproportionality; Address systemic and historical traumas; Improve the lives of children, youth, and families; Improve child safety; Prevent maltreatment; Reduce recurrence of maltreatment; Increase positive parenting practices; Improve child behavioral and emotional functioning

evaluation_metrics.description: Foster care entry rates; Child maltreatment allegation rates; Substantiation rates; In care rates; Racial disparity indices; Entries to foster care: short stayers in care by ethnicity; Reentry to care rates

CA.Notes: Metrics include system-level indicators such as entry, in care, and reentry rates, as well as racial disparity indices. Specific numeric targets are not provided in the available chunks.
